content.rendered:
Directed by Aanand L. Rai

Written by Himanshu Sharma

Cast Shah Rukh Khan (Bauua Singh). Anushka Sharma (Aafia Yusufzai Bhinder). Katrina Kaif (Babita Kumari). Mohd. Zeeshan Ayyub (Guddu (as Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub)). Abhay Deol (Aditya Kapoor). Madhavan (Kartik Srinivasan (as R.Madhavan)). Florentina Kleiner (Gypsy Dancer). N. Barry Carver (American Scientist). Spencer Allport (Street Urchin Derek). Alan Applegate (Street Urchin). Sophia Marie (Party Goer (as Sophia Arrington)). Tatiana Beauchamp (Drunk girl / party guest). Bryan Benfield (Space Program Candidate). Jude Biancone (Truck Driver). Bill Billions (NSAR Security Chief Larry Walter). Jermaine Duval (NSAR Security Deputy Tyler Watts (as Jermaine Boswell)). Saul Cancel (Trainer). Savannah Chappell (Space Program Candidate). Laura Cianciolo (Bar Patron). Hugh Clinton (Street Musician). Bryan Cobaris (Club Bouncer / Partygoer). Anja Conklin (Street Musician). Ava Connolly (Adya). Cliff Craig(Scientist). Denise J. Ellis (Scientist). Pedro Espada (Rockit Fly Band – Vocals). Haley Flanagan (Space Program Candidate). Ashley Formen (Scientist). Ireland Frost (Escort). Ron Harris (Scientist). Emmett Hart (Rockit Fly Band – Drums). Kasey A. Brown (Restaurant patron (uncredited)). Cody Gibson (Aaron Ghale (uncredited)). Karen B. Greer (Restaurant Patron (uncredited)). Ty Hill (Security (uncredited)). Brendan Morris (Party Boy / Concertgoer (uncredited)). James Tilley (Camaro Driver (uncredited)) . Ganesh Acharya (Self). Alia Bhatt (Self). Richard Carr IIi (Party Goer / Driver). Sheeba Chaddha (Beena Singh). Anshul Chauhan (Shamina Khan). Juhi Chawla (Self). Laura Devere Cooper (Party Guest). Remo D’Souza (Self). Tigmanshu Dhulia (Ashok Singh). Missy Erin (Receptionist (as Missy Hargrove)). Michelle Fernandez (Escort). Ashley Forman (Scientist). Todd Gibson (Street Musician). Ramkishan Gurjar (Friend of Bauaa’s). Zacharia Haji (Street Musician). Donald L. Hall (Scientist NSAR). Sheena V. Henderson (Senior Scientist). Ryan C. Joseph (Astronaut Trainer 1 (as Ryan Colby Joseph)). Kajol (Self). Brijendra Kala (Panday). Karisma Kapoor (Self). Salman Khan (Self). Richard Bhakti Klein (Flight Director (as R. Bhakti Klein)). Brandon Laabs (Groom). Talley LaFlamme (Space Program Trainer). Dustin Lamb (Space Program Candidate). Jeffrey Laroche (Rockit Fly Band – Guitar). Brad Lepp (Rockit Fly Band – Bass). Jason Lewing(Trainer). Pete Mangum (Trainer). William Mathews (Top Senior Scientist NSAR). Jossette McCausland (Birthday Girl). Faith McCoy (Senior Scientist (as Faith Monique)). Alan McCrispin (NSAR Security Guard). Sushrii Shreya Mishraa (Aditya Kapoor’s girlfriend). Juakee Moore (Senior Scientist). Abigail Morrison (Bride). Connell Morrissey (Head Technician). Rani Mukerji (Self). Juan Netts Jr.(Street Urchin). Juan Netts (Paparazzi / Party Goer). Deepika Padukone (Self). Tammy Perks (Trainer). Jose Polo-Cueto (Street Musician). Babu Ravi (Srini’s Father). Justine Renee (Trainer). Malcolm Rice (Space Program Candidate). Ben Roa Rodriguez (Street Urchin (as Ben Rodriguez)). Diego Roa Rodriguez (Street Urchin (as Diego Jorge Rodriguez)). Joseph Isaac Rowan (Scientist). Camille Scales (Senior Scientist (as Cam Scales)).Sujeet Kumar Sharma. Brian Nathan Siegal (Cap Com Officer (as Brian Nathan)). Ashish Singh (Jassi Gill Friend (as Aashish Singh)). Angie Slaughter (Hannah Maria). BobAndrew Speirs (Dancer at Masquerade Party). Sridevi (Self). Natasa Stankovic (Aditya’s Girlfriend). Egypt Taylor (Space Program Candidate). Robin Taylor (Top Space Scientist). Matthew Tidmore (Scientist). Elena Tuteja (Custom officer (voice)). UkuLeili (Party Guest (as Leili Molzan)). Ryan Utterback (Street Musician). Rick Walters (Driver). David Ware (Head of security). Harvey C. Wilkes (Driver). O’Harold Williams (Space Program Counsellor). James E. Zielinski (Scientist)

Language Hindi

Producers Karuna Badwal. Gauri Khan. Ravi Sarin. Prashant Shah. Shashikant Sinha. Ashish Tandel

Production Colour Yellow Production. Red Chillies Entertainment. Red Sky Studio
